displayName.text: Global Luxury Suites at Bridge Tower Place

formattedAddress: 401 E 60th St, New York, NY 10022, USA
adrFormatAddress: 401 E 60th St, New York, NY 10022, USA

originalText.text:
Global Luxury Suites at Bridge Tower Place is an apartment located in the Upper East Side district of New York, 1.3 km from United Nations Headquarters. Complimentary WiFi is offered.

The air-conditioned units at the apartment have a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven. A flat-screen TV with cable channels and DVD player are available in some units.

Luxury Suites at Bridge Tower offers a range of wellness facilities including a fitness centre.

A terrace is available for guests to use at the accommodation.

Museum of Modern Art is 1.3 km from Global Luxury Suites at Bridge Tower Place, while St Patrick's Cathedral is a 16-minute walk from the property. LaGuardia Airport is 8 km away.
